item.title: Get Started with Proxmox
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Proxmox Virtual Environment is an open source server virtualization management solution based on QEMU/KVM and LXC. Proxmox VE is based on Debian. You can manage virtual machines, containers, highly available clusters, storage and networks with an integrated, easy-to-use web interface or via CLI. Install I recommend you use USB Flash Drive as Installation Medium because it is the faster option. Download the installer ISO image You can download ISO image from: https://www.
